name: TheSillyOk kernel forks
changelog:
• Newer KSU versions
  • Drop Official KSU
  • Drop NoName 22.1
  • Apply ptrace_fix.patch (fix zygisk detection)
  • Use syscall hooks for KSU
notes:
• SUSFS module, KSU Next Manager, RKSU Manager [Alternative]
  • Filename meanings:
     - "VIC": For Android 15 RDP ROMs made by Magicxavi and PowerX-NOT.
     - "LOS 22.1": For Android 15 Non RDP ROMs.
     - "LOS 18.1": For Android 11 up to Android 14 QPR1 (excluding QPR2/QPR3) Non RDP ROMs.
     - "KSUNext": Kernel has KernelSU Next built-in.
     - "SUSFS": Kernel also includes SUSFS.
     - "NoName": Based on NoName kernel
     - "SM6125": Based on the new kernel by Skyblueborb.
     - "Snowflake": RainZ's kernel
